Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students needing to communicate over a long distance.
The student can design and illustrate a string telephone as a device using the provided materials.
The student can include and label how the string telephone uses sound to send information over a distance.
The student can show and label parts of the string telephone, such as cups and string, in their drawing.
The student can depict how the string telephone meets the need for long-distance communication through sound.
The student can illustrate the importance of the string being tight for the device to work effectively.
